parameters.name: CompliancePackId
parameters.description: The ID of the compliance package to which the rule belongs.

parameters.name: ComplianceType
parameters.description:
The compliance evaluation result of the resources. Valid values:

*   COMPLIANT: The resources are evaluated as compliant.
*   NON_COMPLIANT: The resources are evaluated as non-compliant.
*   NOT_APPLICABLE: The rule does not apply to the resources.
*   INSUFFICIENT_DATA: The resource data is insufficient.

parameters.name: ConfigRuleName
parameters.description: The name of the monitoring rule.

parameters.name: ConfigRuleState
parameters.description:
The status of the rule. Valid values:

*   ACTIVE: The rule is enabled.
*   EVALUATING: The rule is triggered and is being used to monitor resource configurations.
*   INACTIVE: The rule is disabled.

parameters.name: MemberId
parameters.description: This parameter is unavailable since 00:00:00 on June 30, 2021. Account group-related operations are provided as an alternative after 00:00:00 on May 30, 2021. If you are using this parameter, we recommend that you switch to account group-related operations after 00:00:00 on May 30, 2021. For information about account groups, see [Overview](~~211534~~).

parameters.name: MultiAccount
parameters.description: This parameter is unavailable since 00:00:00 on June 30, 2021. Account group-related operations are provided as an alternative after 00:00:00 on May 30, 2021. If you are using this parameter, we recommend that you switch to account group-related operations after 00:00:00 on May 30, 2021. For information about account groups, see [Overview](~~211534~~).

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number of the returned page. A minimum of one entry can be returned on each page.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Valid values: 1 to 100.

parameters.name: RiskLevel
parameters.description:
The risk level of the resources that are not compliant with the rule. Valid values:

*   1: high
*   2: medium
*   3: low
